alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 10:46AM EDT until July 19 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Falls Village. * WHEN...From this morning to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The water reaches Riverside Road at Kent School and floods the picnic area along Route 7 near Housatonic Meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 8.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.6 feet on 04/12/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Sun 10 am: 6.2 Forecast: Sun 2 pm 7.5 Sun 8 pm 8.3 Mon 2 am 8.2 Mon 8 am 8.0 Mon 2 pm 7.7 Mon 8 pm 7.6 Tue 2 am 7.5 Tue 8 am 7.3 Tue 2 pm 7.2 Tue 8 pm 7.1 Wed 2 am 6.9 &&
